Title: Venom of the Red Lotus
Writer: Michael Dante DiMartino (created by), Joshua Hamilton, Tim Hedrick, Bryan Konietzko (created by)
Actors: Janet Varney, David Faustino, Seychelle Gabriel, P.J. Byrne
Plot: After being captured and poisoned by the Red Lotus, Korra must fight to keep herself from being killed in the Avatar State, which would end the entire Avatar Cycle forever.
